divs: Sighting DetailsWell I went to take my son to his bus stop this morning and the sun was not fully risen yet as I was drinking my cofe and speaking to another mother my son had noticed an orb near the sun I said oh that's a planet then as I further looked I noticed that it was floating and It was for certainly not a plane there was no noise and it was moving up and down it appeared then disappeared. As my sons bus came he got on so I walked back home whit my other two children. Five minute later as my second son and I were sitting on our porch I noticed a shinny object it was getting closer it had no noise to it and it was shinny then as it was coming just above my neighbors house it just dissappeard (pulsated). After that there was a helicopter flying around the area where everything took place. Let me just say that this is now the fourth time that I've seen these orbs around the neighborhood. But I must say why in the world would any (ET)come in my area! There is nothing even worth picking up there.
